featured.text: Still, many animal rights activists believe the cost of confining animals outweighs the benefits.
However, in response to the 29 of this event, the concepts of fostering peace and harmony do not have to be confined to one day a year.
B. Ben What gives humans the right to capture, confine, or breed other species?

definition.zh_def: 限制，禁閉，將某物或某人限制在特定的範圍內。
definition.en_def: To restrict someone or something within certain limits.
definition.example: The patient was confined to the hospital for further treatment.
